main.description: Named label pointing to a dataset record. Multiple labels with the same name but different versions can coexist, enabling versioned references to immutable dataset records.

datasetUri.description: AT-URI pointing to the dataset record this label refers to

version.description: Semver or free-form version string, e.g. '1.0.1'. When omitted, the label is unversioned.

description.description: Optional description of this labeled version

createdAt.description: Timestamp when this label was created
